hero.title: TINCADIA
hero.description: We are TINCADIA, a company focused on inclusive technology, accessibility, disability, and artificial intelligence. We are dedicated to promoting social inclusion of people with hearing disabilities and other disabilities in strategic sectors, through innovative solutions that foster equal opportunities. Additionally, we seek to connect companies and establish partnerships across various sectors, eliminating barriers.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Have questions? We have answers.

questions.question: How does Tincadia guarantee the quality of interpreters?
questions.answer: All our interpreters go through a rigorous verification process that includes validation of certifications (ILSE, FESORD), practical interpretation tests, and continuous quality assessments. Additionally, we have a rating and user feedback system that allows us to maintain the highest service standards.

questions.question: Is my data safe on the platform?
questions.answer: The security of your data is our priority. We use end-to-end encryption, comply with data protection regulations (GDPR, LOPD), and conduct periodic security audits. Your personal data is never shared with third parties without your explicit consent.

questions.question: What is the cost of the service for deaf people?
questions.answer: We offer different plans adapted to each need. The Basic Plan is free and includes essential features such as voice-to-text transcription and automatic translation. The Professional and Premium plans offer advanced features with competitive prices and flexible payment options.

questions.question: How are companies selected in the job board?
questions.answer: Companies go through a validation process that verifies their real commitment to inclusion. We evaluate their accessibility policies, organizational culture, and previous experience with diverse talent. Only companies certified as inclusive can post job offers on our platform.
